comment.body:
@kiboke:
Check the link provided by the OP..
The embedded Twitter widget is missing, due to the following filter:
* **I don't care about cookies**
 
`/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=~standard.co.uk|~ladbible.com|~theguardian.com|~theguardian.com.|~bild.de|~autoweek.nl|~computerbild.de|~bold.dk|~welt.de|~t-online.de|~sport1.de|~focus.de|~chip.de|~faz.net|~n-tv.de|~wunderweib.de|~kylie.com|~helpster.de|~tvmovie.de|~praxisvita.de|~cosmopolitan.de|~giga.de|~ostsee-zeitung.de|~sky.com|~lvz.de|~mein-schoener-garten.de|~boerse-online.de|~tvspielfilm.de|~autobild.de|~aftonbladet.se|~bike-bild.de|~bz-berlin.de|~travelbook.de|~cyberport.at|~cyberport.de|~golem.de|~express.de|~ksta.de|~utopia.de|~sky.it|~tv8.it|~cielotv.it|~bndestem.nl|~volkskrant.nl|~rundschau-online.de|~rtl2.de|~capital.fr|~derstandard.de|~derstandard.at|~unsere-helden.com|~rtl.de|~stern.de|~myaccount.hln.be|~nu.nl|~maennersache.de|~dpgmedia.nl|~destentor.nl|~zeit.de|~ad.nl|~dpgmedia.be|~heise.de|~t3n.de|~11freunde.de|~finanzen.at|~finanzen.net|~insider.com|~transfermarkt.at|~transfermarkt.ch|~transfermarkt.co.uk|~transfermarkt.com|~transfermarkt.com.tr|~transfermarkt.de|~transfermarkt.fr|~transfermarkt.it|~transfermarkt.nl|~transfermarkt.pl|~transfermarkt.pt|~transfermarkt.us|~vip.de|~businessinsider.de|~clever-tanken.de|~fitbook.de|~idealo.at|~idealo.co.uk|~idealo.de|~idealo.es|~idealo.fr|~idealo.it|~meinestadt.de|~metal-hammer.de|~musikexpress.de|~myhomebook.de|~noizz.de|~politico.eu|~rollingstone.de|~stylebook.de|~techbook.de|~testbild.de|~wieistmeineip.at|~wieistmeineip.de|~wieistmeineip.ch`
